header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Wildlife, justice system/police, supermarket prices, money/banking, climate/weather, mobile phone providers, pets, customer service, complaints, health, making plans, family
header.activity: Family catching up and chatting about money.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, advising, making arrangements
